name: GymBuddy
description: Mobile first app for use in th Gym. It contains three difrent slips of workouts for six days of the week wich you can use for a month each. It also contains a glosary of difeerent muscle group excersises. And later you're going to be able to save a slip and save your progress. I made this app for my personal use to be able to guide myself while at the gym.
